post.body: drew's because time warner decided to disconnect our internet... supposed to be studying but we're dl-ing music instead :)
good luck at wooster!!!
is it possible to punch the Time Warner cable company in the face? because i really want to
xc skiing ended up being hiking, but still, so happy to have been in the middle of the woods instead of the middle of the city
getting the hell out of Dodge today - going xc skiing in kirtland :)
also - the greenbriar suite at terminal tower is AMAZING
snow :)
so that holiday party felt strangely reminiscent of senior prom... haha. time to change out of this dress :)
did my hair, did my makeup, put on my nicest heels, put on the little black dress... fancy black-tie-optional holiday party here I come!
every sale i rang up today i messed up... batting .000
giant smile plastered across my face for a few very good reasons but primarily the GROUP PROJECT IS DONE!!!!
can't believe the end is in sight for this group project... YESSSSSS
the hardest part about putting together a group presentation is trying to reconcile everyone's different voice in their writing/style. gah.
such a big fan of delegating work :)
so much for starting triathlon training yesterday... sick and tired of being sick and tired
oh yeah, and i'm SICK. totally and completely lame (and very inconveniently timed)
is back here, not happy about it, but at least is not alone in that feeling
ahhhh i don't wanna go back
totally drugged up on benadryl
did a decent 5k time, my team won the turkey bowl, am getting to see friends and family, and am eating tons of delicious food... awesomeness
just the public finance final exam between me and the end of the semester... awesomeness
stats final tonight. then i will be 2/3 done with this semester!
i somehow forgot to gloat on here that I found a CHRISTIAN DIOR trench in mint condition at the goodwill yesterday.
just kidding... got it open.
i can't get this jar of salsa open... i feel pathetic.
i need a personal chef... one that does both grocery shopping and cooking
also, wondering what to do on weeknights now that i don't have class
oh man. all the stress on my body of the past week and a half caught up with me today. :( seriously wishing my body wasn't falling apart.
done done done and i have some awesome classmates!!!
pulling together a portfolio for an interview tomorrow that was just set up today... yikes.
today has been... crazy.
managed to miss both the 9am and 11am mass today... yikes
feeling the need to write letters.
also, i have a ridiculous amount of pita chips left over... holy crap.
my life would be that much more awesome if i could just sleep past 4.
is making the beat transform like Optimus Prime.
there are situational friends, and real friends. i am so thankful for all my friendships that have lasted.
i spent far too much of my day behind the wheel... too stressful. i just do not like driving.
at home!
home in less than 12 hours! (give or take an hour or two...) :)
i forgot how good Iron & Wine is; also, i am quite getting quite excited to see the beauty of upstate/the cape again in a few days
is thanking her property management company for buying our apartment a new toilet for Christmas/Hanukah!
been called pretty three times in the past week... sorta makes up for everything else :)
post-workout high! i love bricks, both the kind with which you construct buildings and the workout where you run after biking.
internship = over. i already miss the giant window by my desk.
well, i resolved things for myself, and oh, btw, the water main pipe that broke in downtown CLE today was installed in 1897. wtf.
feeling like things are so.. unresolved. and not liking the fact that i have to accept things the way they are.
